abstract: China's Citic Resources, which owns 25 percent of Macarthur Coal, said it had agreed to a $16-per-share offer from Peabody Energy, the American coal company.
snippet: China's Citic Resources, which owns 25 percent of Macarthur Coal, said it had agreed to a $16-per-share offer from Peabody Energy, the American coal company.
lead_paragraph: Peabody Energy, the American coal company, moved one step closer to acquiring Macarthur Coal on Friday after the Australian firm's largest shareholder backed Peabody's $4.9 billion takeover offer.

headline.main: Macarthur Coal Shareholder Backs Peabody Bid
